original: @171b * // mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga la /
analyzed: @171b * // mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga la /
translated: The ritual for planting the five stupas is as follows:

original: las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: The other activities are the same as above.

original: de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni stegs bu khru gang gru bzhi pa 'phang du yang khru gang ba zhig byas la /
analyzed: de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni stegs bu khru gang gru bzhi pa 'phang du yang khru gang ba zhig byas la /
translated: For that, the size of the maṇḍala is a square platform one cubit in size, one cubit in height.

original: de'i grva bzhir yang de dang 'dra ba re re byas la /
analyzed: de'i grva bzhir yang de dang 'dra ba re re byas la /
translated: Make four of those in the four corners.

original: dbus kyi stegs bu gru bzhi dang mtha' ma'i stegs bu bzhi'i grva bzhi dang sbyar bar bya /
analyzed: dbus kyi stegs bu gru bzhi dang mtha' ma'i stegs bu bzhi'i grva bzhi dang sbyar bar bya /
translated: Connect the four corners of the central square platform with the four corners of the outer platform.

original: de nas stegs bu dbu ma'i dbus su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'am //
analyzed: de nas stegs bu dbu ma'i dbus su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'am //
translated: In the center of the central platform, draw a sixteen- or twelve-petaled lotus.

original: bcu gnyis pa cig bris te grva bzhi'i stegs bu'i dbus kyi padma 'dab ma grangs bcu drug pa zhig na ni /
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa cig bris te grva bzhi'i stegs bu'i dbus kyi padma 'dab ma grangs bcu drug pa zhig na ni /
translated: If there is a sixteen-petaled lotus in the center of the platform in the four corners,

original: padma 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa bri /
analyzed: padma 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa bri /

original: dbus kyi bcu gnyis pa zhig na ni /
analyzed: dbus kyi bcu gnyis pa zhig na ni /
translated: If there is a twelve-petaled lotus in the center,
draw an eight-petaled lotus at the end.

original: de'i dbus su mchod rten gzhag / mchod rten bzhag pa'i go rims ni /
analyzed: de'i dbus su mchod rten gzhag / mchod rten bzhag pa'i go rims ni /
translated: Place the stupa in the center. The order of placing the stupas is as follows:

original: dang po dbus su bzhag nas /
analyzed: dang po dbus su bzhag nas /
translated: First, place it in the center.

original: mtha' ma bzhi ni shar nas lhor bskor thabs su gzhag go //
analyzed: mtha' ma bzhi ni shar nas lhor bskor thabs su gzhag go //
translated: The last four are placed in the east, south, and so on.

original: yang rnam pa gzhan du na dkyil 'khor grva ma sbyar bar phyogs bzhi ngos ngos sbyar te bya'o ;
analyzed: yang rnam pa gzhan du na dkyil 'khor grva ma sbyar bar phyogs bzhi ngos ngos sbyar te bya'o ;
translated: Or else, without joining the corners of the maṇḍala, one should join the four sides.

original: / grva bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi steng du lhung bzed re re spos chus bkang ste /
analyzed: / grva bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi steng du lhung bzed re re spos chus bkang ste /
translated: In the four corners, on top of the maṇḍala, place a begging bowl filled with perfumed water.

original: mchod do // mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga'o//
analyzed: mchod do // mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga'o//
translated: The rite of planting the five caityas.
